attributes.action: Abolish speed-limits on most British motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our current speed limits have no safety value whatsoever (look at Germanys Autobahns)and simply restrict econmic growth by slowing down transport.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions already on this issue, please consider signing an existing one: 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=speed+limit
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
